events.message: I received my order yesterday, but unfortunately the laptop screen has a large scratch down the middle. It's quite noticeable and affects viewing.
The reported issue about the scratched screen on the laptop has been identified as a product defect.
Assigning the case to the technical support team member specialized in hardware defects.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the scratched laptop screen. I’m here to help you resolve this issue as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the scratched screen along with the order number to assist us in evaluating the defect?
I have attached several close-up photos of the screen scratch and included my order confirmation ID as requested.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer a replacement unit at no extra cost or a full refund if you prefer. Please let us know your preference.
I would like a replacement unit sent out as soon as possible. Thanks for resolving this quickly.
A replacement laptop has been arranged for shipment with expedited delivery. You will receive tracking details shortly.
We wanted to check in and confirm that you have received the replacement laptop and that it meets your expectations.
Yes, the replacement arrived yesterday and the screen is perfect. Thank you for the fast service and support.
We are glad to hear the replacement is satisfactory. Closing the case now, and please reach out anytime if you need more help.
